snippet: Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, the House majority leader, announced Thursday that he will be leading a small House delegation on a visit next week to the Middle East and Europe.
abstract: Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, the House majority leader, announced Thursday that he will be leading a small House delegation on a visit next week to the Middle East and Europe.
lead_paragraph: Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, the House majority leader, announced Thursday that he would be leading a small House delegation on a visit next week to the Middle East and Europe.

headline.main: House Delegation to Travel to Middle East and France
